BERT - Base.on: scientific tasks ( + 2.11 F1 with finetuning and + 2.43 F1 without )

SCIBERT.from sentence: We observe that SCIBERT outperforms BERT - Base on scientific tasks ( + 2.11 F1 with finetuning and + 2.43 F1 without )

Biomedical Domain
We observe that SCIBERT outperforms BERT - Base on biomedical tasks ( + 1.92 F1 with finetuning and + 3.59 F1 without ) .

SCIB - ERT.from sentence: In addition , SCIB - ERT achieves new SOTA results on BC5 CDR and ChemProt , and EBM - NLP .

SCIBERT.from sentence:
Computer Science Domain
We observe that SCIBERT outperforms BERT - Base on computer science tasks ( + 3.55 F1 with finetuning and + 1.13 F1 without ) .

achieves.from sentence: In addition , SCIBERT achieves new SOTA results on ACL - ARC , and the NER part of SciERC .

observe.from sentence:
Multiple Domains
We observe that SCIBERT outperforms BERT - Base on the multidomain tasks ( + 0.49 F1 with finetuning and + 0.93 F1 without ) .

SCIBERT.from sentence: In addition , SCIBERT outperforms the SOTA on Sci - Cite .
